text:
Backend Engineers, All Levels | Coffee Meets Bagel | San Francisco | Full-Time | On-site https://coffeemeetsbagel.com/jobs/

Hey I’m Karim, CTO at Coffee Meets Bagel. I’m looking to hire some backend engineers from mid level to senior to lead (engineering manager).

Our stack is Python, Go, C*, Redis, Elastic Search, PG, Spark, …

Coffee Meets Bagel is a dating app that focuses on quality over quantity. We're growing fast and looking for great engineers to help build new features which help our users fall in love.

We have a super fun office near Union Square right off the BART line and you'd get to work with a bunch of very smart, driven, passionate, and fun people all dedicated to helping our users find love! https://jobs.lever.co/coffeemeetsbagel/70425a5d-b1a1-44c8-88...
